question_text: If the election for President was being held today and the candidates were Hillary Clinton on the Democratic line, Donald Trump on the Republican line, Gary Johnson on the Libertarian Party line, and Jill Stein on the Green Party line, who would you vote for?

If the election for President was being held today and the candidates were Hillary Clinton on the Democratic line, Donald Trump on the Republican line, Gary Johnson on the Libertarian Party line, and Jill Stein on the Green Party line, who would you vote for?

If you had to vote today in a matchup between Hillary Clinton and Donald Trump, who would you vote for?
If you had to vote today in a matchup between Hillary Clinton, Donald Trump, Gary Johnson and Jill Stein, who would you vote for?
1. If the election for President were being held today, and the candidates were Hillary Clinton the Democrat and Donald Trump the Republican, for whom would you vote?
